text.sentence: Hi Girls, I'll be Mrs.
Susan Williams in 8 DAYS!
I'm so excited and nervous and stressed all at the same time.
This has been a hectic week not only with wedding errands but also trying to get my life wrapped up before I take off for three weeks.
Before I leave town, I want to make sure you all know what's going on next weekend.
I think most of you (with the exception of Katie) will be getting in town on Friday.
If anyone will be in Park City by 11:00 am on Friday, I'd love for you to come to the bridal luncheon my grandmother is having for me.
If you can make it, let me know.
Friday night I've got the rehearsal at the church at 5:30.
The rehearsal dinner starts at 7:00 pm at the Marriot.
Dinner will be very casual.
You may want to wear or bring something with long sleeves because dinner is outside and it gets chilly at night (low 60's) in Park City.
After dinner, it will be time to ditch the families and head to Main Street where we will have our choice of two or three bars -all very laid back hole-in-the-wall type places.
On Saturday morning, I would like to have breakfast with all of you.
I want to spend some qualit! y time with you before the day gets hectic.
The location is to-be-announced.
I'll scope out a good breakfast place when I get to Park City.
Unfortunately, we'll have to eat early - around 9:30am -so if any of you have to much fun on Friday night, I'll know why you aren't there ; )
The wedding will be at 3:00pm.
The church is on Main Street (at the top of the hill).
The parking situation is kind of confusing because you can't park on Main Street and the parking lot is on the street that runs behind the church.
You may want to check the church out ahead of time so you know where it is.
The ceremony will be approx 1 hour.
The reception is at Stein Eriksen Lodge which is up the mountain a few miles.
It doesn't start until 5:00 which gives you some time to kill between the wedding and reception.
This will give Eric and I time to take pictures at the church wi! thout having to miss any of the reception.
I figure by the time you freshen up, drive up to Stein Eriksen (which is a beautiful drive up the mountain) and you can have a drink at the bar it will be five o'clock.
After the reception, you are on your own.... Now my request....Can everyone let me know when they are getting into town and where they are staying?
I've got that information for most of you but I just want to verify.
Also, Kelly and Laura - if your husbands want to play golf on Friday morning with Eric and his friends, let me know.
FYI - If anyone wants to treat themselves to a message,manicure/pedicure,etc. while in Park City the number for the Belle Salon is (435)655-8250.
My mom and I leaving on Monday.
If any of you want to get in touch with me, my cell phone is the best place to reach me (832)515-3066.
I can't wait to see all of you next weekend!
I'm so excited that all of you are coming to the wedding.
Each of you is very special to me and it means so much to have you there on my wedding day.
